opis: Ova prekrasna vila na zapadnoj točki Istarskog poluotoka predstavlja vrhunac luksuza i udobnosti. Svaki detalj ove rezidencije pažljivo je osmišljen kako bi gostima pružio nevjerojatan doživljaj. Kada zakoračite na posjed vile, odmah ćete osjetiti mir i privatnost koje pruža visoki kameni zid koji okružuje cijelo područje. Ulazna kovana ograda dodaje šarm i eleganciju, najavljujući luksuzni doživljaj koji vas čeka unutar. Vaša privatna oaza uključuje grijani bazen dimenzija 8m x 4m s protustrujnim plivanjem, koji omogućuje osvježenje i opuštanje u bistrim vodama bez obzira na godišnje doba. Automatska regulacija pH vrijednosti osigurava besprijekoran bazenski doživljaj, dok vanjski tuš s toplom vodom pruža dodatnu udobnost nakon osvježavajućeg plivanja. Za ljubitelje roštilja i vanjskih blagovaona, vila nudi roštilj s provednom strujom i vodom, tako da možete pripremiti ukusne obroke pod vedrim nebom. Kameni stol na vanjskoj blagovaoni stvoren je po mjeri, pružajući prekrasan prostor za uživanje u obrocima s obitelji i prijateljima. Unutar same vile, čekaju vas četiri prostrane spavaće sobe s udobnim francuskim ležajevima, SMART TV-om i inverter klimom. Tri od tih soba imaju izlaz na balkon s kovanom ogradom, pružajući spektakularne poglede na okolni pejzaž i tirkizno more. Tri moderno uređene kupaonice s WC-om jamče privatnost i luksuzni dojam. Dnevni boravak i blagovaona povezani su u jedan prostrani otvoreni prostor, stvarajući idealno mjesto za druženje i opuštanje. Profinjeni dizajn, udoban namještaj i prirodna svjetlost koja ulazi kroz velike staklene površine stvaraju ugodnu atmosferu za uživanje u trenucima sa svojim najdražima. No ova vila je samo početak vašeg istarskog putovanja. Istra je regija koja osvaja srca posjetitelja svojom bogatom poviješću, kulturom i nevjerojatnim krajolikom. Osim sunca i mora, Istra nudi kilometre biciklističkih staza koje vode kroz prekrasnu prirodu. Možete istraživati bajkovite gradiće u unutrašnjosti koji su zaogrnuti velom istarskih legendi, ili posjetiti srednjovjekovne dvorce koji pričaju priče iz prošlih vremena. M +385 91 614 9597 T +385 1 2304 188 RE/MAX Commercial Unitas nekretnine d.o.o. Hondlova 2/9 10000 Zagreb This beautiful villa on the western point of the Istrian peninsula represents the pinnacle of luxury and comfort. Every detail of this residence has been carefully designed to provide guests with an incredible experience. When you step onto the villa property, you will immediately feel the peace and privacy provided by the high stone wall that surrounds the entire area. The entrance wrought iron fence adds charm and elegance, heralding the luxurious experience that awaits you inside. Your private oasis includes an 8m x 4m heated swimming pool with counter-current swimming, which allows you to refresh and relax in clear waters regardless of the season. Automatic pH regulation ensures a seamless pool experience, while an outdoor shower with hot water provides extra comfort after a refreshing swim. For lovers of barbecues and outdoor dining, the villa offers a barbecue with running electricity and water, so you can prepare delicious meals under the open sky. The stone table on the outdoor dining area was custom-made, providing a wonderful space to enjoy meals with family and friends. Inside the villa itself, four spacious bedrooms await you with comfortable French beds, SMART TV and inverter air conditioning. Three of these rooms have access to a balcony with a wrought-iron fence, offering spectacular views of the surrounding landscape and the turquoise sea. Three modern bathrooms with toilets guarantee privacy and a luxurious feel. The living room and dining room are connected in one spacious open space, creating an ideal place for socializing and relaxing. Refined design, comfortable furniture and natural light entering through large glass surfaces create a pleasant atmosphere for enjoying moments with your loved ones. But this villa is only the beginning of your Istrian journey. Istria is a region that wins the hearts of visitors with its rich history, culture and incredible landscape. In addition to sun and sea, Istria offers kilometers of bicycle paths that lead through beautiful nature. You can explore fairy-tale towns in the interior that are shrouded in Istrian legends, or visit medieval castles that tell stories from the past.
